## Tropical Cyclone Analysis in N. America

### Download IBTrACS storm data
Data url: https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/data/international-best-track-archive-for-climate-stewardship-ibtracs/v04r00/access/csv/

```{r}
# load libraries
library(rnoaa)
library(curl)
library(utils)
library(sp)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
# download basins data from NOAA Ibtracs
# NA Basin
download.file("https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/data/international-best-track-archive-for-climate-stewardship-ibtracs/v04r00/access/csv/ibtracs.NA.list.v04r00.csv", "C:/Users/Caroline/Documents/Projects/cyclone/data/ibtracs.NA.list.v04r00.csv")

# EP Basin
```
